scheme_name: Subsidy for Developing Business Premises for Persons with Disabilities
details: The scheme is implemented by the Haryana Backward Classes & Economically Weaker Sections Kalyan Nigam. Under this scheme, loans up to ₹3 lakh are provided to persons with disabilities to develop business premises on their own land & start self-employment activities.
benefits: Loans up to 93 lakh are provided to persons with disabilities to develop business premises on their own land and start self-employment activities.
eligibility: The applicant should be a permanent resident of Haryana.
The applicant should have a disability of at least 40%.
The applicant should be over 18 years old. For persons with mental retardation, the age requirement is relaxed to 14 years instead of the usual 18 years.
The land on which commercial/business complexes are proposed to be constructed should be the applicant's own or it should be on long term lease for more than 20 years from a government agency.
application_process: Login to apply for the scheme.
Fill in all the mandatory details and upload all the mandatory documents.
Preview the application form and click on ‘Submit’.
documents_required: Identity/Citizenship Proof (Any one of the following): Aadhaar Card
Age Proof (Any one of the following): Aadhaar Card
Resident Proof/Address Proof/Ownership Proof (Any one of the following): Ration Card, Haryana Domicile Certificate
Caste/Religion Proof (Any one of the following): Caste Certificate for reserved category
Disability Proof (Any one of the following): Disability Certificate (Disability should not be less than 40%)
